title: Exceptional call quality
description: Enjoy market-leading quality audio communication with friends or groups in real-time. We ensure that every call is crip and clean at all times, so you can hear everyone in a natual way!

title: Share your screen
description: Share your screen, window or game with outstanding quality. 1080p 60fps streams for everyone, making it easy to showcase your work or play games with friends.

title: Customizable themes
description: You are not stuck using a gray app, customize the theme to make it suit your style. You chose the theme, we make it happen.

title: Open source
description: We are open source, meaning you can see the code that runs the app. This means you can trust us, and even contribute to the app if you want to!
